name: A World of My Own
description:
Submission to the Brackeys Jam 2022.1 game jam. Theme: It Is NOT Real.

A World Of My Own

We all live in our own worlds. Sometimes, what is real and what is not is merely a matter of perspective. Opening your mind to different points of view is a necessity in life.

In this game, you do just that. Every object lives not only in your reality, but also in its own. Going into the reality of each object will allow you to solve problems that seem insurmountable if you restrict yourself to your reality.

Controls
  • Arrow keys / WASD - Move.
  • Arrow key UP / W / Space - Jump
  • E near an object - Enter its reality
  • E when in an alternate reality - Return to your reality
  • Esc - Pause/Unpause

The game contains 6 levels. In each you will need to change back and forth between different realities to reach the rabbit hole. Can you reach the end of all levels?

One of the levels presents an optional challenge in the form of a collectible crown that only those fully comfortable with reality switching will be able to reach!

Known Issues

If the loading bar gets stuck, refresh the page and try again. On Chrome, you may have more success if you Right Click -> Reload Frame. If all else fails you can also download the executable files.

The game sometimes halts for a few seconds during the title screen. Wait a few seconds and it should fix itself.

Thank you for playing!
